If a tree could talk, it would say…What a nice environment I live in. I am surrounded by other trees. A lot of birds and insects nest on my branches. Squirrels run up and down my trunk looking for nuts and acorns. This is what I see. I see people running, jogging and going for walks by their selves, with their dogs or with their babies. I see gardeners doing their work of trying to keep the park nice. Sometimes I see people ruining all the flower gardens and plants. I see people playing sports on the fields, particularly baseball and football. I see lots of leaves falling and changing colours on the trees in Autumn, and all the growth in Spring and Summer. In Winter, people always throw snowballs and make snowmen. If I could talk, I would say “keep this park green and keep the earth clean” as it’s a good place to live in most of the time, guys!

I was the white colour to the swan in the moonlight. I was a peacock feather dancing in the rain. I was a drop of dew lying on the leaves of a plant that was shining when the sun rose. I was the purest water in the river that was flowing slowly. I was the gentle breeze you felt that day on the hill top. I was the sound of a waterfall that soothe your heart. I was the wings of the birds that flew high in the sky without fear! Yet, I was incomplete, just because you left me so! Today, I want to grow even stronger. I want to be the swan that shined alone that night, the peacock that danced which was so mesmerising, the sunlight that remarked the dewdrop, the river that was flowing without any destination, the waterfall that was so courageous, the birds that flew fearless! And Yes Without you!!!
